explains: n. 未判决囚犯；被扣押者

sentences.en: Hence, also, the urgent need for a coherent detainee policy.
sentences.cn: 因此急切需要一直连贯的拘留政策。

sentences.en: An Iwawa island detainee standing next to a Rwandan soldier who also lives on the island.
sentences.cn: 一名羁押犯站在一名卢旺达士兵的旁边。

sentences.en: Preventing this detainee from coming to our shores would prevent his trial and conviction.
sentences.cn: 不将此人引渡到我国便意味着不能对他进行庭审和定罪。
